articles.title: MTI's Johann Steynberg arrested in Brazil - Moneyweb
articles.description: South Africa’s financial regulator has confirmed that it has been notified by the Hawks of Steynberg’s arrest in the South American country.
articles.content:
The mystery around the whereabouts of illusive Mirror Trading International (MTI) CEO Johann Steynberg has been answered.
According to Brazilian military police, he was arrested last week in the pro… [+2551 chars]
